info.title: Automation Actions V4
info.x-hubspot-api-use-case: You want to empower other users in your account to automate specialized parts of their day-to-day processes (e.g., creating highly customized quotes based on the data from an enrolled contact and their associations).
info.x-hubspot-introduction: Use the automation API to define custom actions in the HubSpot workflows tool, which allows users in your account to integrate with external services as they build out a HubSpot workflow.

get.description: Retrieve custom workflow action definitions by app ID.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of results to display per page.

parameters.name: after
parameters.description: The paging cursor token of the last successfully read resource will be returned as the `paging.next.after` JSON property of a paged response containing more results.

parameters.name: archived
parameters.description: Whether to return only results that have been archived.

link.description: A URL that can be used to retrieve the next page results.

after.description: A paging cursor token for retrieving subsequent pages.

next.description: Specifies the paging information needed to retrieve the next set of results in a paginated API response

get.summary: Retrieve functions for a given definition
get.description: Retrieve all functions included in a definition.

get.summary: Retrieve functions by a type for a given definition
get.description: Retrieve functions of a specific type for a given definition.

parameters.name: functionType
parameters.description: The type of function. Can be `PRE_ACTION_EXECUTION`, `PRE_FETCH_OPTIONS`, `POST_FETCH_OPTIONS`, `POST_ACTION_EXECUTION`.

parameters.description: The type of function. Can be `PRE_ACTION_EXECUTION`, `PRE_FETCH_OPTIONS`, `POST_FETCH_OPTIONS`, `POST_ACTION_EXECUTION`.

parameters.description: The type of function. Can be `PRE_ACTION_EXECUTION`, `PRE_FETCH_OPTIONS`, `POST_FETCH_OPTIONS`, `POST_ACTION_EXECUTION`.
